subject: Rugby (Game)
Movies
Race
lead_paragraph: “Invictus” is not a rugby movie unless you want it to be. Rather, it’s a reminder to us that sometimes sport can be a starting point, and can pave the way for much more than just talk.
snippet: “Invictus” is not a rugby movie unless you want it to be. Rather, it’s a reminder to us that sometimes sport can be a starting point, and can pave the way for much more than just talk.
